data.name: Rage in Peace - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Collaborated with sound artist company Monkey Melody and indie label Nanaba Records, this Official Soundtrack of Rage In Peace consists of 19 addictive songs from Indonesian indie bands, as well as in-game BGMs. Perfect for out adventuring in your everyday life, or simply spending a day in the park, as the songs will be the soundtrack of your life. In the end, who doesn’t need a good soundtrack to start a day, right?

Available in MP3 320 kbps formats, the Rage In Peace OST will be available for download November 8, 2018.


Tracklist:

01 - “Ending Beginning” by Monkey Melody (01:26)
02 - “Selamanya” by Monkey Melody (01:44)
03 - “Heaven’s So Far” by Monkey Melody (04:10)
04 - “Inclination” by Marsh Kids (02:46)
05 - “Warm Light” by Monkey Melody (05:10)
06 - “Future Days” by L'Alphalpha (04:44)
07 - “Make You Happy” by Monkey Melody (01:23)
08 - “Love Me Again” by Ikkubaru (03:51)
09 - “Make You Grief” by Monkey Melody (01:23)
10 - “Sinking Boat” by Okky Ade Chandra (04:05)
11 - “Thin Holidays” by Peonies (02:17)
12 - “Nothing Compares” by Rina Nurhasanah ft. Monkey Melody (01:31)
13 - “Rest Your Head On The Day” by Sajama Cut (01:36)
14 - “Fraud” by Fin The Pop Kid (03:20)
15 - “Hold Your Breath” by Lightcraft (01:59)
16 - “Forgiveness” by Monkey Melody (01:56)
17 - “Ending: Departure” by Gardika Gigih (04:02)
18 - “In Hope I Die” by UTBBYS (02:01)
19 - “In Peace” by Okky Ade Chandra (05:53)


Bonus Track:

In-Game BGMs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Storage: 224 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz
  • Storage: 224 MB available space
